formalText: They feel better this week than they have for the last couple of weeks.
They are concerned about hosting their parents in their tiny apartment.
It's no particular thing that they are worried about other than there's no particular thing, when it come to hosting their parents at their house.
His wife has a hard time when he is upset about stuff.
He doesn't feel he did anything in particular to send her over the edge and she knows
His wife feels guilty about trying take her life.
They feel like conversations they have with their wife are not the same they use to have four months ago.
They are working on the categories of being considerate of others needs and how it works in their life.
He does not want to express himself In the Heat of the Moment for fear of hurting Tanya.
He feels like he needs to tell his wife to take her medication.
Their parents are coming to visit this weekend.
Feels like there are more concentration of jobs in those larger cities that they don't want.
